author: antoine
title: Cardano Hub Caracas
description: Caracas has no visible Cardano community. Venezuela suffers from the world's worst inflation. People lack awareness of Cardano as an option
solution: Create a Cardano Community Hub in Caracas. Host Educational workshop's in Spanish, led by local community members.
experience:
Hosting Bitcoin meetups and workshops since 2013.
Organizing online Venezuelan crypto communities  
Hosting Cardano meetups in Toronto.
